title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Warriors w/ Marcus Thompson, Celtics w/ Chris Mannix, Matchups w/ Jason Timpf
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Warriors w/ Marcus Thompson, Celtics w/ Chris Mannix, Matchups w/ Jason Timpf
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, The Athletic Bay Area columnist Marcus Thompson on how the former NBA fathers of Finals players have rubbed off on their sons, if the Warriors would drastically re-shape their roster with a Finals loss, how KD would process another Warriors title, and how his relationships with Steph and Draymond differ.

Then, SI Senior NBA Writer - and host of Boxing with Chris Mannix - Chris Mannix on if the Warriors are done, why the Celtics severely struggled early under Ime Udoka, how he got his players to buy in, and why Brad Stevens deserves credit for this potential title run.

Finally, Hoops Tonight Podcast host Jason Timpf on why Robert Williams has been the difference maker for the Celtics, and why the matchups might spell doom for the Warriors.

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
